INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Adams
INBOX.MESSAGE: Got the new recruit set up. Nice work. I'll try to channel his anger into something productive.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Adams
INBOX.MESSAGE: Got the new recruits set up. Good engineers. Nice to have them back on the side of the angels.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Admiral Raan
INBOX.MESSAGE: Zaal'Koris' return has saved many civilian ships, Commander. Thank you again for finding him on Rannoch.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Allers
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thanks for giving me this chance, Commander. I promise it'll be worth your time.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Allers
INBOX.MESSAGE: Interview has aired--and it's getting re-run all over the place! You and your household name....

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Allers
INBOX.MESSAGE: Getting fan mail from salarian space. A lot of "I signed up because I heard about Earth." Every little bit counts!

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Allers
INBOX.MESSAGE: You wouldn't believe my fan mail. People HATE Cerberus! Arrests all over human space. Thought you should know!

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Allers
INBOX.MESSAGE: Sorry to leave so early. Had to head out when the coast was clear. Had a nice time. <3

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Anderson
INBOX.MESSAGE: Losing comms. It's hell down here, Shepard. Get us some help. Will be in touch--when I can.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Aria
INBOX.MESSAGE: Well, it's not Sederis, but it's close enough. Eclipse is on board. Nice work.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Aria
INBOX.MESSAGE: Sederis is one crazy bitch. Fortunately she's our crazy bitch. Eclipse is on board.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Aria
INBOX.MESSAGE: Nice work with Narl. The Blood Pack needs to fight, and I need cannon fodder.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Aria
INBOX.MESSAGE: Nice work on Vosque. Glad you didn't have to get your hands dirty, Spectre.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Aria
INBOX.MESSAGE: Hope that doesn't trouble your conscience. The Blue Suns are mine now. Thanks for the help.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Aria
INBOX.MESSAGE: Good to see you haven't lost your edge now that you've gone legit again. Let's do some business.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Aria
INBOX.MESSAGE: I'm stretching out on my old bed again and thinking of you. Come by anytime.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Ash
INBOX.MESSAGE: Heard you came by while I was out. Appreciate it. I'm awake. Lots of drugs, though.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Ash
INBOX.MESSAGE: Looks like I'm getting out of the hospital. About time.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Ash
INBOX.MESSAGE: I'll try to do humanity proud as a Spectre. I've got a lot to live up to.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Ash
INBOX.MESSAGE: Heard Garrus is back on board. That is good news.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Ash
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thanks again for coming to the memorial. That means a lot.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Ash
INBOX.MESSAGE: Ready for action, Commander. Also, never drinking with Vega again.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Ash
INBOX.MESSAGE: After our talk all I'm thinking of is my Dad's cooking. Normandy chow just isn't cutting it.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Ash
INBOX.MESSAGE: Doubt any of us will be getting much sleep anytime soon. But I believe in you.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Ash
INBOX.MESSAGE: Hey, Skipper. They might actually let me see you today. Hang in there.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Ash
INBOX.MESSAGE: Why am I not surprised that mess was all Cerberus. After everything we did trying to help those people on Horizon.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Ash
INBOX.MESSAGE: Did we just go on a picnic? I think we did. Excellent.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Ash
INBOX.MESSAGE: They sure don't cover stuff like that rachni monster in basic training. Can't believe it.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Ash
INBOX.MESSAGE: Still trying to decide if the turian strategy was a good idea or not. Tough call.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Bailey
INBOX.MESSAGE: Hell of a mess down here. Could've been a lot worse, though. Thanks.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Chakwas
INBOX.MESSAGE: I've got everything set up in the medbay, Commander. Glad to be back in action.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Chakwas
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thanks for speaking with the refugees, Commander.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Conrad
INBOX.MESSAGE: Wow, Jenna is really something! And she likes me! Listen, if you ever need help on the Normandy, just let me know!

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Cortez
INBOX.MESSAGE: Good to see you, Commander. Come by again if you want to talk shop.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Cortez
INBOX.MESSAGE: You were right. Good to get off the Normandy and watch the ships go by for a bit.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Cortez
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thanks for coming. Don't know if I'd've been able to get through it without you there.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Cortez
INBOX.MESSAGE: Doubt any of us will be getting much sleep anytime soon. But I believe in you.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Din Korlack
INBOX.MESSAGE: The bombers are on their way. Thank you for saving my life, Earth-clan.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: EDI
INBOX.MESSAGE: I have made the necessary preparations regarding krogan support, although the long-term issues remain.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: EDI
INBOX.MESSAGE: Shepard, when you have time, I have another question for you. Actually, I have 1,623,058, but I'm pacing myself.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: EDI
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thank you for discussing my questions. Speaking with you results in better advice than searching the extranet.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: EDI
INBOX.MESSAGE: The geth dreadnought was fascinating. Even in combat, the geth remain an intriguing synthetic species.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: EDI
INBOX.MESSAGE: I wish I could have entered the consensus with you. It sounds like a remarkable experience.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: EDI
INBOX.MESSAGE: I am devoting additional resources to studying Reaper movements. We are going to beat them, Shepard.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: EDI
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thank you for speaking with me about the Illusive Man. I cannot guarantee myself error-free, but I will do my best.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: Good to be back where I belong. Thanks for the update on cross-species liaisons.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: Good to be back where I belong. Less politics and more shooting.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: You forget where I hang out, Shepard? I'm getting things ship-shape in the Main Battery.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: Alliance tech have this cannon out of alignment. Good thing you've got me to help.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: Asked around about that turian team on Tuchanka but got stonewalled. Whatever it is, it's big.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: Too bad Wrex is in such a bad mood. The reunion isn't what I'd hoped it would be.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: You, me, and Wrex. Just like old times. Too bad it took the Reapers to make it happen.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: I don't like this Wreav guy, Shepard. He's the reason they invented the genophage in the first place.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: Appreciate the check-in. It hurts to see soldiers in that damn camp. At least it reminds me what we're fighting for.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: For a guy named "Joker", he tells some terrible ones. With the krogan on our side, I guess he's allowed to celebrate.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: Summoning the mother of all thresher maws? You never make it dull, do you? Just wish we had all come home.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: Glad we didn't have to add a name to this wall, Shepard. Thanks for coming by.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: Glad we got Jacob out of there okay. Thought we'd be doing a replay of my siege on Omega for a bit there.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: Let me know if you ever want a rematch somewhere less windy. Those tornadoes on the Citadel are brutal.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: This wall's getting heavy. Let's hope we don't have to put too many more names on it.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: Congrats on being the Galactic Champion of Bottle Shooting. When the bottles rise and attack we'll know who to turn to.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: Still not used to being in charge. If only they'd asked my opinion a few years earlier...

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: Even after that whole Overlord nightmare, Shepard? Gutsy move!

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: Glad you were the one to talk to the Reaper. I would've just shot it some more for spite.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thanks for coming by. Not many people to talk with about the big choices these days.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: Damn Cerberus bastards. They sent us to help Horizon before, and now they've destroyed it themselves.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: Let me know when you want to show me a few more vid moves... or more target practice. Hope you're still flexible.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: It's late. Just got up for some water. You're still asleep. Wanted to say how beautiful I think you are. Love G

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: Doubt any of us will be getting much sleep anytime soon. But I believe in you.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Garrus
INBOX.MESSAGE: Just wanted to say even with all this craziness, you're still a beautiful sight. Get some sleep. Love G

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Geth Primes
INBOX.MESSAGE: Our cognition is vastly improved. We thank you, Shepard-Commander. The geth will reciprocate this trust.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Grunt
INBOX.MESSAGE: Healing up. Bored.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Grunt
INBOX.MESSAGE: Back on my feet. Getting my assignment today. About time.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Hackett
INBOX.MESSAGE: You never were one to miss a chance to make alliances, Commander. Nice work with the geth.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Hackett
INBOX.MESSAGE: Nice work bringing in the quarians. Victus is already reporting them helping out.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Hackett
INBOX.MESSAGE: Hope these synthetics work well on our side. Their fleet's impressive, I'll give them that.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Jack
INBOX.MESSAGE: Hey, Shepard. Looks like we're getting ready for the final push. Good luck out there.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Jack
INBOX.MESSAGE: Just blew up an entire Reaper base. Brought the whole thing down. Reminded me of you.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Jack
INBOX.MESSAGE: Rodriguez just ripped a husk's head off. May be some hope for her yet.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Jack
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thanks for helping me out with shore leave. Also, you're still a crappy dancer.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Jacob
INBOX.MESSAGE: Here's the update. Brynn now wants to call the baby 'Hackett'. Heh, not bad for a girl, I guess.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Jacob
INBOX.MESSAGE: Hey Shepard. Got all the families settled and everyone's working 24/7 now.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Jacob
INBOX.MESSAGE: Hey, Commander. Signed up for active duty. Maybe I'll see you on Earth. Reapers are gonna pay.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: James
INBOX.MESSAGE: Damn, the Citadel is huge. And quiet. Lemme know when it's time to go kick some Reaper ass.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: James
INBOX.MESSAGE: Hey, Loco/Lola, thanks for the practice. Lemme know if you ever want a rematch.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: James
INBOX.MESSAGE: You impressed the hell outta the boys. Now they're getting me free drinks!

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: James
INBOX.MESSAGE: Damn those turians aren't afraid to go all the way.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: James
INBOX.MESSAGE: Hell of a thing down there. Glad that thresher maw's on our side, huh?

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: James
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thanks for showing me the shiny digs. Still not sure if N7's right for me, but the talk helps.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: James
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thanks for checking up on the grunts, Commander. Lemme know if you ever want a rematch.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: James
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thanks for buying the round, Commander. Impressed the hell outta the boys.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: James
INBOX.MESSAGE: Damn, yeah, this ink stings a bit more than usual. Still worth it, though.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Javik
INBOX.MESSAGE: I will help you, but evolve faster. Typing messages like this is an insult.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Javik
INBOX.MESSAGE: Salarians used to lick their eyes in my cycle. Now they shoot guns?

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Javik
INBOX.MESSAGE: The lizard doctor made me read him. His thoughts are even more confusing than his speech.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Javik
INBOX.MESSAGE: Water is significantly more intuitive than this clumsy apparatus. I am limited in how many charact

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Javik
INBOX.MESSAGE: Hope did not save my people. But we never bothered to try. Maybe your cycle will be different.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Javik
INBOX.MESSAGE: I can assist if you have difficulty with the airlock.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Javik
INBOX.MESSAGE: Foolish. You allowed a machine access to your mind? What if it infected you?

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Javik
INBOX.MESSAGE: Your asari is strong. But I will not tell her that. She must find her own strength.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Javik
INBOX.MESSAGE: I had forgotten their faces. Thank you for that much.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Javik
INBOX.MESSAGE: The other species are too optimistic. Reapers can't be wished away. Hope did not save my people.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Javik
INBOX.MESSAGE: Let those mutated asari be a warning against failure. The whole galaxy could end the same.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Javik
INBOX.MESSAGE: I enjoyed killing machines again. More satisfying than organics.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Javik
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thresher maws have gotten much bigger. Too big to ride now. A shame.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Javik
INBOX.MESSAGE: It was good to see one of my own kind again. A pity about the asari's world. There are always other planets.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Joker
INBOX.MESSAGE: But what if the ghosts are restless? What then? I imagine you have many.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Joker
INBOX.MESSAGE: Oh man, EDI's asking some guy for his opinion on the war. I think he thinks he's being recorded.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Joker
INBOX.MESSAGE: Hey! Don't scratch the paint on the new EDI-bot, okay?

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Joker
INBOX.MESSAGE: Not many pilots could handle a pickup with an unfamiliar ship in the middle of a space battle. Just sayin'.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Joker
INBOX.MESSAGE: Any time you want me to play tag with a Cerberus cruiser, you just let me know.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Joker
INBOX.MESSAGE: I think next time we hit the Citadel, I'm gonna show EDI the sights. No way that could go wrong, right?

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Joker
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thanks for coming by, Commander. Liquid courage wasn't cutting it. Needed the old-fashioned kind.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Joker
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thanks for coming by, Commander. Probably would've made an ass outta myself otherwise.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Joker
INBOX.MESSAGE: YOU ARE THE BEST COMMANDER EVER ALSO I AM A LITTLE DRUNK RIGHT NOW

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Joker
INBOX.MESSAGE: You are a cold, cold commander. Look at this. Galaxy on fire, I'm paying for my own drinks.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Jondum Bau
INBOX.MESSAGE: Calling in favors from a few friends. We'll be around when you need us.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Kaidan
INBOX.MESSAGE: Heard you came by while I was out. Thanks, Commander. I'm up, most of time, at least.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Kaidan
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thanks again for the chat. Sometimes you gotta talk through things to figure them out, you know?

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Kaidan
INBOX.MESSAGE: I'll try to do humanity proud as a Spectre. Know I've got a lot to live up to.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Kaidan
INBOX.MESSAGE: I got my things and set up on the starboard observation deck. Come by whenever you like, okay? Door's open.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Kaidan
INBOX.MESSAGE: I got my things and set up on the starboard observation deck. Feels good to be back. Thanks.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Kaidan
INBOX.MESSAGE: One thing more about the Illusive Man--can't help but be grateful he brought you back. Weird feeling. Life's strange.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Kaidan
INBOX.MESSAGE: Glad you stopped by, Commander. Maybe next time we can deal you in, give Vega someone else to take money from.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Kaidan
INBOX.MESSAGE: I can't believe what I just saw--what Cerberus did. After everything we did trying to help those people on Horizon.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Kaidan
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thanks for listening. Only place I'd rather be right now is Earth and if I can't be there, I'm glad I'm here.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Kaidan
INBOX.MESSAGE: Hey, I'm so happy. That's all. How can the future be so unsure and so bright at the same time. Yours, Kaidan.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Kaidan
INBOX.MESSAGE: Doubt any of us will be getting much sleep anytime soon. But I believe in you.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Kaidan
INBOX.MESSAGE: Hey, Commander. Thought I might come down to see you today--if they let me. Here's hoping.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Kasumi
INBOX.MESSAGE: Crucible project...so much shiny tech...this is gonna be fun, Shep.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Kelly
INBOX.MESSAGE: I took your advice. Thanks. I'll be around, even if you don't recognize me at first.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Kelly
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thanks for understanding why I can't come back. I'm proud I can at least do good work here.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Liara
INBOX.MESSAGE: If it's all right, I've set up equipment in the old XO quarters. Hopefully it will help.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Liara
INBOX.MESSAGE: I've set up my equipment in the old XO quarters. Come by when you can.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Liara
INBOX.MESSAGE: Hope you like what I've done with the room. Come back if there's anything else you'd like to do with it...

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Liara
INBOX.MESSAGE: Hope you like what I've done with the room. I'll let you know when I have more data on the Crucible.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Liara
INBOX.MESSAGE: This isn't at all what I assumed a Prothean would be like. He's fascinating, but... I guess we'll see.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Liara
INBOX.MESSAGE: It was nice to sit and have a drink on the Presidium, even if I was working.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Liara
INBOX.MESSAGE: Sur'Kesh had some impressive secret technology. Hopefully they didn't mind me taking a few scans.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Liara
INBOX.MESSAGE: Hope that in a few centuries, the Reapers are just a long-faded memory. Thanks for the visit.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Liara
INBOX.MESSAGE: Message out and away. Perhaps the hanar will be building statues to you in 50,000 years...

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Liara
INBOX.MESSAGE: It was nice to take some time and look at the water again. thank you, Shepard.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Liara
INBOX.MESSAGE: It was horrible to see the Ardat-Yakshi like that. Thank you for taking the time to destroy the monastery.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Liara
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thank you for talking. It helps.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Liara
INBOX.MESSAGE: I enjoyed our walk... and I look forward to many more together, whatever happens.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Liara
INBOX.MESSAGE: I doubt any of us will be getting much sleep, Shepard. But I believe in you..

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Liara
INBOX.MESSAGE: Whatever happens, Shepard, I'll be there to help. For now, I'm hunting intel on Cerberus.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Michael
INBOX.MESSAGE: I'm set up in the medbay, Commander. I hope I can help.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Michael
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thanks for speaking with the refugees, Commander. Glad it worked out.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Miranda
INBOX.MESSAGE: I managed to catch up with a few old contacts. They didn't want to talk; but they did. More later.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Miranda
INBOX.MESSAGE: Just heard about the Illusive Man. Wish I could have seen his face. Still getting patched up.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Miranda
INBOX.MESSAGE: Finally got back to the Citadel. Found what I needed. Talk to you soon.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Miranda
INBOX.MESSAGE: Good luck.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Mordin
INBOX.MESSAGE: Shepard, where is my lab? Using Med-bay but change to room layout very confusing.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Mordin
INBOX.MESSAGE: Shepard. Should visit Med-Bay when you have free moment. Eve enjoys meeting new people.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Noles
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thanks for helping me track those codes. No further trouble on my end. Good luck with the batarian fleet.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Noles
INBOX.MESSAGE: Nice work taking down that batarian. Worth a little paperwork to have one less terrorist running around.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Padok Wiks
INBOX.MESSAGE: Commander, Eve seems in good spirits.  I know you're busy, but you should drop by the Med-Bay when you have a chance.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Padok Wiks
INBOX.MESSAGE: Did we get away with it, Commander? I'd rather not have Wreav's mercenaries hunting me the rest of my life.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Samara
INBOX.MESSAGE: I have been dispatched to an asari colony under siege. There is so much suffering here. I will do what I can.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Samara
INBOX.MESSAGE: The Reapers have been driven back from this colony, for now. They are many, Shepard, but their forces can falter.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Samara
INBOX.MESSAGE: I will enjoy fighting the Reapers. I tire of duties that test my resolve and not my courage.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Solik Vass
INBOX.MESSAGE: The video is coming together amazingly, Commander. This is going to get people stirred up!

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Tali
INBOX.MESSAGE: I'll keep it professional in public, Shepard. But glad to know your feelings haven't changed.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Tali
INBOX.MESSAGE: I had a wonderful night. Thank you...and thanks for waiting.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Tali
INBOX.MESSAGE: As horrible as it was down there, part of me is still amazed to have set foot on Rannoch.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Tali
INBOX.MESSAGE: Even without geth in suits, we're getting some nice upgrades. Geth code plus quarian ingenuity is something to see!

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Tali
INBOX.MESSAGE: Got word from the Fleet. They're ready to help whenever we need them. Eager to defend their new world.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Tali
INBOX.MESSAGE: Jacob seems like a good man. A shame he stayed with Cerberus for so long.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Tali
INBOX.MESSAGE: Spiders, Shepard. Seriously. Spiders.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Tali
INBOX.MESSAGE: For the record, I could still kick that turian diplomat in the gizzard. I won't, but I could.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Tali
INBOX.MESSAGE: Ready to get back to the action, but it was nice to take a moment on the Citadel. Thanks.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Tali
INBOX.MESSAGE: It will never be drinks and a vid with us, but it was still nice to take a moment on the Citadel.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Tali
INBOX.MESSAGE: Hang in there Shepard. You can do it.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Tali
INBOX.MESSAGE: hey Shepard im in teh lounge havinga drink, wanna hwlp?

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Tali
INBOX.MESSAGE: Ow. Head hurts. Why do people do this for fun? And what happened to my spellchecker?

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Tali
INBOX.MESSAGE: I expect we'll be having more sleepless nights before this is over. But whatever happens, I'm with you.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Tali
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thanks for having me up to your cabin. It felt great to escape the war, at least for a little while.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Thane
INBOX.MESSAGE: Shepard, if you can come, hurry. Not much time.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Thane
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thank you for taking the time to speak with me, Shepard. I wish I could be of more help.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Thane
INBOX.MESSAGE: I regret that you have to see me in this condition, Siha. I wish I could be of more help.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Traynor
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thanks for the talk, Commander. I found an asari toothbrush on the Citadel. Their teeth are like ours, right?

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Traynor
INBOX.MESSAGE: I'm making preparations for the Normandy, to serve as our summit conference center. Good luck, Commander.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Traynor
INBOX.MESSAGE: The new tech EDI licensed works like a charm. I could learn to like this ship.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Traynor
INBOX.MESSAGE: I'm not saying I'd volunteer. So don't go looking for bombs.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Traynor
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thanks for having me up, Commander. And for being a good sport when I destroyed you at chess.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Traynor
INBOX.MESSAGE: Thanks for the shower. Oddly, I'm still feeling kind of dirty...

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Traynor
INBOX.MESSAGE: Don't know when you'll have a chance for a good night's sleep, Commander. But I'll be there.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Traynor
INBOX.MESSAGE: Good luck on Horizon, Commander. If you find any civilians, do what you can, okay?

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Traynor
INBOX.MESSAGE: Good luck with Cerberus. Blow those bastards to hell.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Udina
INBOX.MESSAGE: I heard about the asari. Do what you can with the turians. I'm going to explore other possibilities.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Udina
INBOX.MESSAGE: The asari pulled out? They're hanging us out to dry. Do what you can. I'm pursuing other options.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Udina
INBOX.MESSAGE: Without the asari, your summit fails. Anderson didn't lay enough groundwork. I'll fix what I can.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Wreav
INBOX.MESSAGE: When this is over, I'm gonna kill the salarian. Nobody does a "procedure" on me like that and lives.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Wreav
INBOX.MESSAGE: Shepard, the females aren't getting pregnant. They must be out of practice.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Wrex
INBOX.MESSAGE: Damn. This BETTER cure the genophage. The salarian's "procedure" hurts like hell.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Wrex
INBOX.MESSAGE: I know what you did.

INBOX.TITLE: eventthing
INBOX.NAME: Zaeed
INBOX.MESSAGE: No way we're all getting out of this war alive. Be fun to try, though.
